author: Shayne
comment: Great Looking but it won't install on my Fossil Q Founder  Updated since first install I have more knowledge of my Fossil and now find this app really amazing, it looks great and performs very well! I am really enjoying it. 😁

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Shayne thank you very much for the update, I am so glad that it works well and suits you :-)

comment: Looks amazing on my Huawei watch and is fun to customize!  Edit: I have the same watch but a new phone. Custom tags worked when I  had the LG phone  but aren't working with my Samsung S8. Would that make a difference?  Edit2: I didn't see the big blue checkmark to set my changes.  It's all good now!!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Laura :-)

author: Brent Crane
comment: Love the face but wont stop asking for permissions and it wont let you set them .. such a shame pls fix. Lg g watch r & edge 7  wear 2.0 i think UPDATE: for anyone having the same issue i had whereby the watch locked on the permissions screen... uninstall from both watch and phone then reinstall and it works second time round :)

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: The face needs basic permissions to operate. Please grant them, if you still have issues please mail me at: academyextreme@gmail.com and we can check together what's wrong with your settings. UPDATE: Thank you for the detailed feedback :-)

author: David Richards
comment: I keep going back to this face set up the interactives and it's all good.

author: Brent Consie
comment: Great watch.  Great customization.

author: Ian Evans
comment: Its a nice watch face. Only thing that annoys me a little, is the date format doesn't seem to be changeable, or if it is, it's hidden in a horribly busy config app

author: Tim Petrowitsch
comment: Love the capability of your watch face apps. One suggestion I have though is to add in the brightness control for dim mode similar to your other app. That helped to make elegant faces even for dim mode and still make it a day or so on battery life. Otherwise,I'll be buying the other apps just to support your development further. Thank you for what you do. This is what Android Wear should have always been.

author: al ghareeb
comment: I bought the watch and install it from google play, i switch to my watch, Huawei watch, I couldn't find it, I looked every where, and still Can't find it,  can you please help me with that, or can I get a refund ?

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
Dear Al - you seems to be lost in Android Wear - please mail me and I will give you personal support. 
Mail: academyextreme@gmail.com
I offered you support numerous times... Al - what's up?

author: Amos Trout
comment: This is an amazing watch face. It's incredibly customizable from the font to the interactive aspect, and is by far the best watch face I've found yet. I absolutely love this design, and will most likely be looking at the other watch faces this group creates. I'd also love if they somehow added a font/card that allowed this face to look like a nixie tube watch. However, not having that option doesn't detract from the usability and aesthetics of this watch face.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Amos! Working hard to keep the apps interesting :-)

comment: Tons of settings make this a real gem! So many faces purchased have minimal settings and fine tuning adjustments to make it just how you like it. THIS face has so much to offer you can play around for hours to get it exactly how you like it. Well done! A real gem

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much for amazing review :-)

author: Al Probert
comment: Just what I was looking for! A note to those who want UK date format: choose 'custom text' as either top or bottom display and type in:  then 'send text' to display Mon 17 May for example.

author: Kram Rhewdnal
comment: Weather is not accurate or will not sync. Otherwise this is a nice watch face but does not get 5 stars.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Kram please check Battery Savings: exclude Flip Clock. Please also check both weather providers. It's not my fault that weather data on providers side is served sometimes less someone more accurate. I can promise to have an eye on it. Thanks!

author: Suhartono Utama
comment: Could not running in my Sony Smartwatch 3 with Android 5.0.2 (Lenovo Vibe Z2 Pro)

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Well - it works, look around - if you need help with operating your watch let me know by mail or check my FAQ: http://bit.ly/wearfaq - Thanks!

author: Mark Thomson
comment: Amazing watch face as many have said the interactive zones bring a whole level of functionality . Sony smartwatch 3
Would be better if you could have the same customizable options as minimal and elegant but overwise a great app.

author: Ryan Berg
comment: They just keep updating a must have.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much Ryan! :-)

title: Must have

comment: Surprisingly battery efficient with such smooth animation.

comment: Awesome watchface. I enjoy starting my apps with a single tap on digits

author: Martin Franklin
comment: Great

author: Nick Chalmers
comment: Love it

reply.author: Studio eXtreme

author: Bill
comment: Great idea.  Turn off power savings for app to get phone power updates more often

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: It's related to your battery savings. Exclude the app from battery optimizations and all will be working as expected Bill. If you need detailed support mail me please: academyextreme@gmail.com

title: Like it

author: John Reed
comment: Sony smartwatch 3

author: David Kubilunas
comment: Very cool watch face for those of us remember this flip before the digital watch face

author: Tamago Tono
comment: Awesome Dev, great face.
title: Just buy it already

author: Kevin Kite
comment: This is a fantastic, clean face with a great feature list as well as a lot of customizability. If I could see one more feature added, I'd want an option to show phone signal strength and WiFi service on the watch face. I hate not knowing when I've lost signal and a glance at my watch could fix this up nicely. Thanks for an amazing app.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Kevin! I'll try to add tasker support to the Flip Clock so then you will be able to show anything you would like ;-) Should be in one of very next versions :-)

title: Love this Face

author: Miles Andrew2
comment: Thank you dev for an affordable watch face that updates well and has the needed basic functions. I have an lg g watch w100 and both battery info icons and other text is kinda small for me to read on my square watch by default. Overall, the watch ui could be higher contrast as a suggestion maybe even materialised. I hope android wear has a long bright future ahead of itself. - Miles

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hello Miles. Please check the "Enable tint" option in Colors section - you can colorize the face in the way you want, setting the "themes" for flaps may lead to the contrast you desire :-) Contact me via mail in case of more questions. Thanks!

author: Stuart Curtis Lathrop
comment: The best clone of an old classic giving  you unparalleled features and functionality. Add to this and active community and superior developer support and you have the best watch!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you so much Stuart!!! It's so great to read such reviews :-)

title: Old school looks with modern tech!

author: dan Bdan
comment: Spotify track skip action is great! :-).. just discovered the custom face community on g+ very good :-)

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Dan - integral system settings aren't set for actions. In case of more questions please join our communities. Thank you :-)

author: Russian Bot
comment: Who knew a flip clock could have so many options?! Little Worlds, colors, fonts, textures... this has it all! If you're looking for a watch face that's easy on the eyes in any situation, look no further.
title: The flip clock...transformed!

author: Robert Wal
comment: I am not able to uninstall this app which I have decided I do not wihd to purchase.  I have android wear and I have installed numerous watch faces without problems.  Help

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
Dear Robert. Please do not ask for help by 1-star, you have my mail, communities and website for that.
Every app in the system can be uninstalled at least by 2 ways: 1) via Play Store (open it again in play store and press: uninstall) 2) via Settings: open Settings then Apps Manager, find app do whatever you need. Thank you. UPDATE2: Robert?

author: Owen
comment: My favourite watch face so far. Retro style & so many customisation options, just can't find anything I like better!
title: Love it!

author: Gonen Steinig
comment: Great watch face , simple with fun customization , what will make it better is to add an option to display next meeting from agenda.
title: Love it
